page.title: 16"Industrial Metheringham"
page.content: Metheringham is a large village with quite a few industries.In station yard is{Ross Drainage.}They do land drainage and make slabs,fencing panels and wooden poles.The industrial estate on the southern side of the railway has 26 lots, 18 are being used for various purposes,the rest are to_let. In the 18 lots being used there is a {Pine Furniture}workshop which makes tables,chairs,beds and wardrobes,a fencing contractor who makes wire and wooden fences,a car repair workshop, a carpet sales, an electrical tools centre,a door and window showroom, a chemical works,a coachworks , a concrete works called {Castmix}which makes slabs and bricks and a fancy gift workshop which makes wooden toys.All these businessess provide employment for skilled workers.
